about_the_game:
It's back, and it's better than ever! The new revamped version of the Albino Hunter is here to stay!

In this Turn-Based RPG, Kalymn Nox returns as the Albino Hunter (as in the hunter with albinism, not some jerk who hunts albinos); even his pretentious and slightly racist title can keep him from waking up broke after a night of drinking. In this exploration-encouraging world, join Kalymn as he finds and takes on various jobs throughout the land which include:

-Spontaneous Engagement
-A Telepathic Lizard
-A Witch with a Poorly Insulated Castle

And hey! That was just in the Demo alone! Be sure to check out the Full Version if you like what you see here!

Recommended Age: 14+

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 64-bit Processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Kalymn Nox returns as the Albino Hunter (as in the hunter with albinism, not some creep who hunts albinos); even his pretentious and slightly racist title can keep him from waking up broke after a night of drinking. Join him as he takes on various jobs throughout the land.
